name: Jelly Candy Dash-Tap Tap Crush
description:
Welcome to the funniest cartoon puzzle adventure!

Get ready to party with Jelly Candy dash in a completely new kind of puzzle game!

Numerous monsters and obstacles and unexpected traps waiting for you to challenge, there are many special settings waiting for you to experience!

The gameplay is as simple as it is satisfying. The jelly can only jump, and perform an air dash in one of 4 directions. Upon colliding with an object that doesn't break you, you are free to dash again.

- Cool & Fun Features

- Collect coin and gem.
- Tough but fair difficulty.
- So many levels to challenge and conquer.
- Challenge your friends in this ambitious game!
- Simple, accessible controls. Simple taps and swipes are all you need to play!
